attributes.action: make sure all universities offer certain degrees such as the sciences and maths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like all universities to have to offer courses in highly skilled degrees such as the sciences or maths before offering courses in other subject. This would not include universities which wanted to specialise in a certain field such as mining or drama.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
